definitions.definition: An act of refuting or disproving ; the disproving of an argument , opinion , testimony , doctrine or theory by argument or countervailing proof; evidence of falseness .
A vocal answer to an attack on one's assertions .

main_definition: An act of refuting or disproving ; the disproving of an argument , opinion , testimony , doctrine or theory by argument or countervailing proof; evidence of falseness .
secondary_definitions: ( proscribed ) A vocal answer to an attack on one's assertions .
